'''Bear McCreary''' (born [[February 17]], [[1979]]) is an American musician and composer. He composed the soundtrack for the television series [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]].<ref>{{webcite||articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0566970/|articlename=IMDB Profile||website=IMDB|accessed=1 August 2022}}</ref><ref>{{webcite||articleurl=https://deadline.com/2022/07/the-lord-of-the-rings-the-rings-of-power-series-howard-shore-returns-bear-mccreary-composes-score-amazon-1235073588/|articlename= Howard Shore Returns & Bear McCreary Scores Amazon's 'The Lord Of The Rings: The Rings Of Power||website=Deadline Hollywood|accessed=2 December 2022}}</ref> He writes extensively on his blog about the process of scoring the series.<ref>[https://bearmccreary.com/project/the-lord-of-the-rings-the-rings-of-power/ The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power] on BearMcCreary.com (accessed 5 July 2023)</ref>
